resources.string: Our Daily Bread - Choose to Share

< Our Daily Bread > is published and distributed by RBC Ministries. All spiritual information resources in this app is from and owned by RBC Ministries. This app simply captures information from website and present on mobile devices.

Often sermoned by the pastor/priest for not reading Daily Bread became an opportunity for me to make this app. I hope people under same circumstance like mine could accept the Heavenly grace and words via this app.
Please use wifi or connect to 3G internet !
Please check Internet connection and restart application again.
Press this button will check data update immediately.
You can easily search title, author, and article content by keywords.
Press application icon button, the menu will slide-out automatically.
Inside the cycle, slide from right to left will bring calendar out, you can pick any day you like and flip to it easily.
Inside the cycle, slide from bottom to top(or from top to bottom) will flip the page smoothly.

St. Nicholas Church in Galway, Ireland, has both a long history and an active present. It’s the oldest church in Ireland, and it provides guidance in a very practical way. The church towers over the town, and its steeple is used by ships’ captains as a guide for navigating their way safely into Galway Bay. For centuries, this church has…
